com.guardtime.ksi.service.ha

Class HAService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.ksi.service.ha.HAService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KSIExtendingService, KSISigningService, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class HAService
extends Object
implements KSISigningService, KSIExtendingService
    Combines SigningHAService and ExtendingHAService

                                 throws KSIException
        Description copied from interface: KSISigningService
        Used to create new signature.
        Specified by:
        sign in interface KSISigningService
        Parameters:
        dataHash - - instance of DataHash to be signed.
        level - - level of the dataHash to be signed in the overall tree.
        Returns:
        instance of AggregationResponseFuture containing Aggregation response data.
        Throws:
        KSIException

      • extend

        public Future<ExtensionResponse> extend(Date aggregationTime,
                                        Date publicationTime)
                                 throws KSIException
        Description copied from interface: KSIExtendingService
        Used to extend existing signatures.
        Specified by:
        extend in interface KSIExtendingService
        Parameters:
        aggregationTime - - aggregation time of the existing signature.
        publicationTime - - publication time to which the existing signature is to be extended.
        Returns:
        instance of ExtensionResponseFuture containing calendar chains needed to extend the signature.
        Throws:
        KSIException
        See Also:
        ExtendingHAService.extend(Date, Date)

        public void registerAggregatorConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener<AggregatorConfiguration> listener)
        Description copied from interface: KSISigningService
        Registers a new for the client. Each time client's configuration is updated, this listener is called.
        Specified by:

      • getSubSigningServices

        public List<KSISigningService> getSubSigningServices()
        Description copied from interface: KSISigningService
        If the implementation combines multiple clients then this method can be used to get those subclients. If the implementation is a client that directly connects to a single gateway then it will return an empty list.
        Specified by:
        getSubSigningServices in interface KSISigningService
        See Also:
        SigningHAService.getSubSigningServices()

      • getSubExtendingServices

        public List<KSIExtendingService> getSubExtendingServices()

        If the implementation combines multiple clients then this method can be used to get those subservices. If the implementation is a client that directly connects to a single gateway then it will return an empty list.

        See Also:
        ExtendingHAService.getSubExtendingServices()
